name: Out of Thyme (gid2772, shpowell, Willowj, Deriogames, pjeff7, Rowann12, coffee milk, Ryantheinventor)
name_original: Out of Thyme (gid2772, shpowell, Willowj, Deriogames, pjeff7, Rowann12, coffee milk, Ryantheinventor)
description:
Run around the store and collect the listed ingredients! Be sure to keep an eye out on the time👀 Also be sure to look out for thyme, as it's never in the same place. Other food objects have set places within the store yet will be randomized on the list. Once you get all the items you need, you must make a final dash to the checkout to finish.

Special mentions to amazing people :D
